Installation¶

Requirement¶

pyLLE relies on a python >3.4 front-end for a user friendly interface – either through script commands or GUI - and on a julia back-end for fast computation. Hence, one need to download and install julia first before running the installation of pyLLE.

The different julia packages required for solving the LLE and interfacing with python will be installed while pyLLE is set up.

Auto installation¶

After installing julia on the machine just run:

pip install pyLLE

Manual Installation¶

Download the .zip repository or clone it using

git clone https://github.com/gregmoille/pyLLE.git
cd pyLLE
python setup.py install
